start.speaker: Robin
start.text: Hey there! You must be the new farmer. Welcome to Pelican Town!

nice_meet.speaker: Robin
nice_meet.text: Nice to meet you too! I'm Robin, the local carpenter. If you ever need any buildings constructed, just come see me!

who_are_you.speaker: Robin
who_are_you.text: Oh, how rude of me! I'm Robin. I run the carpentry shop just north of here with my husband Demetrius.

buildings.speaker: Robin
buildings.text: I can build you barns, coops, silos, and more! Bring me the materials and some gold, and I'll have it done in no time.

bye.speaker: Robin
bye.text: Good luck with the farm! Come visit anytime.
